templates.text: Hello, {playerName}. What brings you here today?
I have a letter that needs delivering to {recipientName}. Can you help?
This is urgent! Please deliver this to {recipientName} before {deadline}!
Thank you for delivering that letter. You've been most helpful.
I'm disappointed you couldn't deliver my letter on time.
Care to make a trade? I have {itemName} for {price} coins.
